channel.title: Projects on Job
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Job

item.title: COVID-19 Tracker
item.description: COVID-19 Tracker App During the pandemic, the stats of the number of the corona virus cases were everywhere. I thought it would be nice to create a web application to track the number of active covid cases, the number of patients recovered from COVID and the number of deaths. It includes both daily statistics and all time statistics The web application is built using React JS framework and an API to collect the statistics to display the COVID-19 cases.

item.title: ICMEC 2022
item.description: ICMEC 2022 website I was assigned to build a website for the International Conference on Modern Electronic Components (ICMEC) which is going to be held at Vellore Institute of Technology, AP in 2022. ICMEC 22 â€“First International Conference being organized by the School of Electronics Engineering at Vellore Institute of Technology, Andhra Pradesh in Coordination with Springer. The focus of this forum is to present the latest developments in the area of Electronic devices , Communication systems and components, Signal Processing and AI for electronic components and Systems bring together the researchers and practitioners, from both academia and industry.

item.title: TEDxVITAP 2021
item.description: TEDxVITAP website On the 10th of April 2021, VITAP held a TEDxVITAP event, which was named “The Unstoppables” . I was appointed as the website developer along with some other web developers. This website was built using React JS framework. I would like to thank Sai Pranay, Vineet Tiwari, and SK Saddam Hossain, who were my teammates in this project. Thank you guys.
